programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: Should I Stay Or Should I Go?
programme.desc: As each couple finally makes the choice whether to stay together or leave their original spouse, poignant moments reveal insights to their lives prior to 'The Experiment'. Dark pasts and twisted secrets come to light.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: It Ain'T Over Til It'S Over
programme.desc: After the dramatic reveal of their choices to stay or leave, the participants of The Experiment attempt to process the new lives they now face. But The Experiment isn't done with them just yet.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: Each participant seriously considers their options when The Experiment offers them a 3-day reprieve, but they only have 24 hours to decide.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: Once Upon A Time In Vegas
programme.desc: When The Experiment drops off the individuals taking advantage of the 3-day reprieve in an undisclosed location, they soon rediscover the reasons they fell in love and are forced to confront the ugly truths tearing them apart.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: As the reprieve comes to an end, everyone must choose wisely as The Experiment offers them a chance to decide, once and for all, to stay with or leave their original spouses.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: Having made their final decisions, the participants begin to move on with their lives only to be brought back into The Experiment by a common dark force that connects them all in a mysterious way.

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.sub-title: Stuck With You 101: Lemons and Oranges
programme.desc: It couple Candance and Luvell are reminded of the complications surrounding their secret when challenged by a prying and popular podcast host, Tee.

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.sub-title: Stuck With You 102: Beware of the Ex
programme.desc: Candace's sexy ex, Vaughn, comes to town and makes it clear he still has his eye on the prize, threatening Luvell in more than one way. Mora, emotionally lost in her

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.sub-title: Stuck With You 103: If Only For a Night
programme.desc: After lunch with a super fan drums up old feelings between Candace and Luvell, they plan a date that ends up being a night neither one of them will forget. Mora finally gets the date of her dream, but it ends up a nightmare.

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.sub-title: Stuck With You 104: With These Vows
programme.desc: Candace's Aunt Claire comes to town with big news. Candace and Luvell attempt to keep things less complicated between them by vowing to abstain from casual sex with each other. Unfortunately Candace learns Luvell's struggle goes beyond the physical.

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.sub-title: Stuck With You 105: Convenience of Comfort
programme.desc: A crazy night of bachelor and bachelorette parties for Aunt Claire and Terrence leads to some hard truths amongst the ladies and fellas.

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.desc: Candace and Luvell come face to face with the true state of their relationship. Katrina's deep secret is revealed while Mora puts herself in a very compromising position.

programme.title: Hush
programme.sub-title: Hush 101: Like a Moth to a Flame
programme.desc: Dr. Draya Logan develops a selacious but exciting case study of three desperate housewives with deadly repercussions.

programme.title: Hush
programme.desc: Draya tries to pry information from Gina as she falls deeper into her web of lies with Julio and Alejandro.

programme.title: Hush
programme.desc: The penthouse gets more action when Syleena and Terrell introduce their masquerade parties, but not before Draya spots a guest that could jeopardize everything.

programme.title: Hush
programme.desc: Still unable to break her shell, Draya dives deeper into Jordan and her many secrets.

programme.title: Hush
programme.sub-title: Hush 105: When I Think of You
programme.desc: Syleena gets a visit from her past, causing she and Terrell to seek a huge favor from Mona Dee; Draya finds drugs at the penthouse.

programme.title: Hush

programme.title: Hush
programme.desc: Draya finds out that even a therapist needs a therapist when Dr. Serena pays her an unexpected visit; The ladies are being blackmailed at the penthouse.

programme.title: Hush
programme.desc: After her visit with Dr. Serena, Draya is ready to end the penthouse project, but not before more drama ensues.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: Each couple embarks on a social test called The Experiment and are promised a chance at healing their marraiges but have no idea what to expect.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: Each couple meets their new spouse and tension is all around as it brings a different level of openness insecurity and vulnerability.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: The couples try to make the most of the process but the deeper they go the more their values and vows with their original spouses, conflict.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: Things begin to heat up as they realize they were paired with the person who can give them exactly what they need at this point in their lives.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: It's the Final Day of the Experiment and the participants leave it all on the table before going back to their original spouses.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: After the ultimate experience the participants return home with their original spouses, and all must decide if they are going to stay together or not.
